title: Be Scared of Me

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Haunt a player. Players will know if they have been haunted.
- Once per game during the day, unleash a nightmare for the following night and choose either odd-numbered players or even-numbered players. Nightmares will be publicly announced at the start of the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn the roles of players you haunt, bypassing all detection immunity.
- If a haunted player visits you for the rest of the game, you will rampage at their house, bloodying their will and gaining basic defense for the night.
- During a nightmare, all town visits that target even/odd (the one you chose) numbered players will fail, unless they are targeting you, and will also be dealt an unstoppable attack.
- You have a layer of basic defence that blocks one attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.
